name: Kingdom of Metamorphs Post Mortem
description:
The post mortem of my game: Kingdom of Metamorphs.

I had a lot of fun making this game!

Updates:

-Changed the blinking on unused minions to a more noticeable color.
-Made the AI about 5 times faster.
-Fixed a few typos.
-Added a proper win and lose screen.

Ainoras Žukauskas
